title: The Tooth Fairies
description: This enchanting children's book, reveals what really happens to a child's tooth after it has been collected by the tooth fairies. Beautifully illustrated in a whimsical style, "The Tooth Fairies" will delight and captivate a child's imagination. The pages are glossy and colorful, making this book a precious gift for someone very special.
author: Belinda Richman
